https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yFp0FLOc4Yb6hzZdLVbWVmJSmVi.jpg The All Warrior Network presents a story of soldiers from the 4th Brigade Combat Team 25th Infantry Division (Airborne) defending a combat outpost from a massive Taliban attack on July 4th, 2009, five days after the disappearance of PFC Bowe Bergdahl. Attack on the Fourth of July
